# Result&lt;TValue&gt;.Value property

Gets the value of the result, throwing an exception if the result is failed.

```csharp
public TValue Value { get; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | Thrown when attempting to get or set the value of a failed result. |
